org.ardenus.input.handler

Class WirelessInputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.input.handler.InputHandler
      • org.ardenus.input.handler.WirelessInputHandler

  • public class WirelessInputHandler
extends InputHandler
    An input handler that can be used to listen for wireless controller inputs using the GLFW controller API.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin.

      • isValidControllerType

        private boolean isValidControllerType(ControllerType type)
        Parameters:
        type - the controller type.
        Returns:

      • hasController

        public boolean hasController(int jid)
        Parameters:
        jid - the controller's joystick ID.
        Returns:
        true if there is a connected controller with the specified joystick ID.

        Called when the input handler is updated.
        Specified by:
        onUpdate in class InputHandler
        Parameters:
